description: Your skin has turned the color of spring growth.  Your skin is now a viridian green.  This has no gameplay effects.
Your skin has turned into a type of plant matter, which in addition to any armoring slows your loss of fluids.
The skin on your body has grown into a barklike state.  This provides significantly more armor but reduces flexibility.
A viridian moss has grown on your skin, forming whorls and eldritch patterns, providing some protection from the cold and the wet.  It also provides a small amount of armor against acid or fire.

The trees recognize you as one of their own and allow you to pass easily beneath their boughs.  The grass moves under your feet to speed your passage, and shrubs bend out of the way.  When walking on grass, trees, or other natural foliage, your movement speed is increased.
Upon gaining this ability the Arvore may greatly speed plant growth.  With enough practice, you will even be able to bring forth mighty trees from the dry earth.
//: This only causes growth in existing plants.  Growing new plants from nothing should be advanced mutations/spells.

description: Upon gaining this ability the Arvore may create structures of living wood on natural terrain.
Upon gaining this ability the Arvore gains the ability to draw on the peace and strength of nature while standing in a wild area.
Upon gaining this ability the Arvore gains the ability to summon thick tangles of briars to form walls or entrap their enemies.
Upon gaining this ability the Arvore gains the ability to transport themselves from tree to nearby tree while within a forest.
//: Ideally this would require the destination as well as the departure point to be in a forest (in which case, maybe it could be expanded to fields), but no way to do that for now.

description: Upon gaining this ability the Arvore gains the ability to induce decay and dissolution in the surrounding area.

name.str: Call the Children of the Roots

description: Upon gaining this ability the Arvore gains the ability to summon a wood spirit.
Upon gaining this ability, the Arvore gains the ability to summon semitangible roots that will shatter walls and furniture.

name.str: From Root to Root the Forest Is Joined

description: Upon gaining this ability, the Arvore gains the ability to travel great distances, even dozens of miles, in moments, as long as they start and end their journey within the depths of a forest.
Upon gaining this ability, the Arvore gains the ability to cause rapid plant growth in a radius around themselves.
Upon gaining this ability the Arvore gains the ability to bind their soul to the heart of the forest, rebirthing themselves when on the verge of death.
You have bound your soul to the forest, and death will merely be a momentary inconvenience.
Upon gaining this ability the Arvore gains the ability to infuse their companions with the vitality of the forest.
Upon gaining this ability the Arvore gains the ability to call up grasping roots from the ground.
Upon gaining this ability the Arvore gains the ability to summon a thick climbing vine from diggable ground.
Upon gaining this ability the Arvore gains the ability to damage plant and fungal entities, including others of their own kind.
Upon gaining this ability the Arvore gains the ability to grow a goblin fruit when in natural areas away from civilization.
The Arvore are closely tied with the forests and may commune with the trees to learn the layout of the land.  Activate this ability to enter the communion.
Drawing out the power inherent in growing wood makes weapons composed of it more deadly in your hands.  You do increased damage when wielding a weapon primarily made of wood.
With a brief effort of will, the Arvore may infuse their blood with a poison that harms any who bite them.
//: Ideally this would be powered by mana, but thirst will work for now

description: The Arvore may release clouds of pollen that ruin the coordination of their enemies when breathed in.
//: Ideally this would be powered by mana, but thirst will work for now

description: Like a tree, you are fueled by the sun.  When standing in the sunlight, you will absorb its energy as nutrients and heal slightly faster.
//: No messages so you aren't constantly spammed while you're walking in and out of buildings.  Being a fae spirit, the arvore doesn't need uncovered arms or head or anything--simply being in the sun is enough.

description: You feel the warm sun radiating down on you and revitalizing you.  You are absorbing the sun's energy as nutrients and will heal slightly faster.
//: Halfway between fast healer and very fast healer, but only outside in the sun

description: Like a tree, you are fueled by the sun.  When standing in the sunlight, you will absorb its energy as nutrients, heal slightly faster, and your mana regenerates much quicker.
//: No messages so you aren't constantly spammed while you're walking in and out of buildings.  Being a fae spirit, the arvore doesn't need uncovered arms or head or anything--simply being in the sun is enough.

description: You feel the warm sun radiating down on you and revitalizing you.  You are absorbing the sun's energy as nutrients, will heal slightly faster, and your mana is regenerating quicker.
//: Halfway between fast healer and very fast healer, but only outside in the sun

description: Like a tree, you draw nourishment from the sun and the soil.  When standing in the sunlight and on natural terrain, you absorb its energy as food.  You still need to drink water and you will still get hungry.
You feel the warm sun radiating down on you and revitalizing you.  You are absorbing the sun's energy as food and will need to eat much less.
Filled with the energy of life, pain does not affect you as strongly.
At will, you can extend a cluster of grasping vines to grab one target and drag them in.  They have a range equal to 1/2 your Dexterity.
At will, you can transform your hands into jagged wooden claws.  They are potent weapons but make anything other than combat more difficult.

transform.msg_transform: Your fingers itch as jagged wood rapidly covers them.

description: Your hands are transformed into jagged wooden claws.  You can use them to attack, but performing mundane tasks will be harder.

transform.msg_transform: The wood covering your hands receeds, leaving no trace behind.

description: Plants lose their leaves in winter, but that does not kill them, they simply sleep until the spring comes.  The cold bothers you less now.
Pine trees keep their leaves even in the coldest winter.  The cold bothers you now not at all.
By the places of the sun and the moon, you can always tell exactly what time it is.
By the places of the sun and the moon, you can always tell exactly what time it is.  Or you could, if you weren't underground.
The wilderness welcomes you as one of its own, and you have an easier time surviving there and making things from its bounty.  +1.5 Survival skill.
Like green wood, you can bend your limbs easily.  You gain a +4 bonus to Dexterity.
Like the seedling poking through the soil, you have great strength hidden within you.  +1 Strength.
Like the young tree reaching for the sun, your limbs are filled with power.  +3 Strength.
Like forest giants that have stood for a hundred years, you are unshakeable.  +5 Strength.
When one tree in a grove is attacked by insects, soon all trees will produce the deterrent.  +3 Perception.
The forest recognizes your kinship and will hide you beneath its boughs.
//: Ideally there'd be some way to detect what sort of terrain was nearby and you'd need a critical mass of foliage, but the below will work for now.
//2: No messages so you aren't constantly spammed while you're walking around the overmap.

description: The forest is hiding you from your enemies.

Upon gaining this ability the Arvore's eyes begin reflecting the seasons: a bright yellow-green in spring; verdant green in summer; red, yellow, or orange in autumn, and dark brown in winter.  Glare no longer impacts them.
The Arvore's ears are longer and pointed, more "leaf-shaped."  While they cannot hear any better, like the trees in the deep forest, they are unphased by loud sounds.

//: Visibility here because the Arvore's skin flushes a different color when the blood isn't red.
description: The Arvore's blood is now composed of sap and vegetable matter.  This does not benefit or harm them in any ways, but humans will be discomfited by it.
The Arvore's blood is a sticky sap that oozes rather than gushes from their wounds.  They will bleed more slowly than normal.

The Arvore's blood is a sticky sap that oozes rather than gushes from their wounds and has potent defensive properties.  They will bleed more slowly than normal and are immune to parasites and infection.

The Arvore's blood is a sticky sap that that oozes rather than gushes from their wounds and aggressively fights back against invading organisms.  They will bleed much more slowly than normal, are immune to parasites and infection, and cannot be transformed by the Mycus.

At will, the Arvore can grow long vines from their shoulders and back.  They can be used to climb or to lash at enemies, and can also be detached to serve as a rope if necessary.  Activate to toggle vines on and off.
In the whispers of the leaves and the movement of the grasses, the forest warns you of approaching dangers.  When outside and near thick foliage, you can detect your enemies.
In the whispers of the leaves and the movement of the grasses, the forest warns you of approaching dangers.  The foliage is whispering to you of hidden dangers nearby.

In the whispers of the leaves and the movement of the grasses, the forest warns you of approaching dangers.  When outside and near thick foliage, you can detect your enemies.  Also, you can see further when you're standing in a forest.

In the whispers of the leaves and the movement of the grasses, the forest warns you of approaching dangers.  The foliage is whispering to you of hidden dangers nearby and revealing the lay of the land to you.
Your hair now has flowers and small vines and leaves growing in it.  It's pleasant to look at but has no further game effect.
The flowers in your hair produce a pleasant smell, obvious without being overpowering.  You no longer smell anything like a human and other beings will react to you appropriately.

Every rose has its thorn and so do you.  With a moment's concentration, you can exude thorns through your skin that have a chance of damaging attackers while increasing the damage of your unarmed attacks.  However, you cannot wear rigid armor over your thorns.

transform.msg_transform: Woody thorns push through your skin!

description: You are exuding thorns through your skin that have a chance of damaging attackers while increasing the damage of your unarmed attacks.  However, you cannot wear rigid armor over your thorns.

transform.msg_transform: Your thorns retract, leaving smooth unbroken skin behind.

description: The flowers in your hair produce an intoxicating smell.  You no longer smell anything like a human and other beings will react to you appropriately.  At will, you can enhance this scent to an overpowering level, beguiling humans and making them more suggestible at the cost of greatly increasing the range at which others can smell you.

transform.msg_transform: A cloying scent fills the air.

description: The flowers in your hair produce an intoxicating smell.  You no longer smell anything like a human and other beings will react to you appropriately.  You are enhancing this scent to an overpowering level, beguiling humans and making them more suggestible at the cost of greatly increasing the range at which others can smell you.

transform.msg_transform: The scent filling the air fades away.

description: When in wild areas, you can draw on the revitalizing power of the land to heal yourself.  When in natural areas, your limbs will heal much faster.

//: Once limb loss is possible, this mutation should allow the Arvore to regrow lost limbs.
description: When in wild areas, you can draw on the revitalizing power of the land to heal yourself.  In this natural areas, your limbs are regenerating.

You may transform into a tree, extending roots and spreading leaves out to the sun.  You will heal faster, gain more benefit from sleep, and almost all monsters will ignore you, but you will only be dimly aware of the outside world and will be nearly unable to move.
You are a tree.  You will heal much more quickly and resting is more beneficial.  You are unable to see, hear, or move, but have a dim awareness of nearby movement.
//: Healing values copied from the Regeneration mutation
//2: NETHER_EMANATION missing from the above list is deliberate--they hone in on mental activity and the transformed Arvore still thinks.

description: Like a tree, you are fueled by the sun.  When standing in the sunlight, you will absorb its energy as nutrients, heal slightly faster, your mana regenerates much quicker, and you gain a bonus to your maximum mana.
//: No messages so you aren't constantly spammed while you're walking in and out of buildings.  Being a fae spirit, the arvore doesn't need uncovered arms or head or anything--simply being in the sun is enough.

description: You feel the warm sun radiating down on you and revitalizing you.  You are absorbing the sun's energy as nutrients, will heal slightly faster, your mana is regenerating quicker, and your maximum mana is increased.
//: Halfway between fast healer and very fast healer, but only outside in the sun

description: Like a tree, you are fueled by the sun.  When standing in the sunlight, you will absorb its energy as nutrients, heal slightly faster, your mana regenerates much quicker, you gain a bonus to your maximum mana, and you gain a +2 bonus to all stats.
//: No messages so you aren't constantly spammed while you're walking in and out of buildings.  Being a fae spirit, the arvore doesn't need uncovered arms or head or anything--simply being in the sun is enough.

description: You feel the warm sun radiating down on you and revitalizing you.  You are absorbing the sun's energy as nutrients, will heal slightly faster, your mana is regenerating quicker, your maximum mana is increased, and you have +2 to all stats.
//: Halfway between fast healer and very fast healer, but only outside in the sun
